sentences.en: Her mouth held its usual pout.
She looked at her lover with a pretentious pout.
sentences.cn: 她看着恋人,故作不悦地撅着嘴.

sentences.en: She shot me a reproachful pout.
sentences.cn: 她不满地朝我撅了一下嘴。

sentences.en: So had his mouth been set, rather full and controlled, a soft, self - absorbed pout.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴就是这副样子, 相当饱满且很有节制, 一副温和的, 只顾自己的撅嘴模样.

sentences.en: They mince and prim and pout.
sentences.cn: 她们矫揉造作,一本正经还撅着嘴.

sentences.en: Tip me up and pout me out.
sentences.cn: “把我拿起来,然后把我里面的茶倒出来”.

sentences.en: Today, under the sky with intermittent rain, God seemed to pout, looked gloomy.
sentences.cn: 今天, 天上下着淅淅沥沥的雨, 老天爷好像板着脸, 显得阴沉沉的.

sentences.en: Tonight, you can watch the women figure skaters pout and preen their way to the medals.
sentences.cn: 今晚, 你们将看到女子花样滑冰选手把自己打扮得漂漂亮亮的,去争取金牌.

sentences.en: You better watch out, you better not cry! You better not pout, I'm telling you why.
sentences.cn: 你最好注意, 你最好别叫! 你最好别噘嘴, 我告诉你其中原委.

trans.tran_cn: 撅嘴, 板脸, 生气, 大头鱼类
撅嘴，噘着嘴说，发脾气，鼓起，膨胀
